name: Memories of the Dead
description:
A top down shooter prototype starring the living and the living dead.

Memories of the Dead demonstrates:

  • Three unique levels of war on the deceased.
  • Intuitive mouse-only shooting and reloading controls.
  • Stealth mechanics with sight and sound-based detection.
  • Health mechanic where you can choose whether to continue to fight after being bitten.
  • A scoring system that gives you a letter grade based on your performance.
  • A tense boss confrontation and visceral finale.
  • Original animation, art, and sound.
